definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: obedient band, body of subjects;—only sf.:
prob. = body-guard, as esp. bound to obedience, [[מִשְׁמַעְתָּךָ]] 1Sa 22:14 captain over thy guard (Ew Be:Ch Dr Bu Now), cf. [[תּוֹ]]- 2Sa 23:23 = 1Ch 11:25.
[[תָּם]]- Is 11:14 the sons of Ammon (shall be) their subjects (‖[[מוֹאָב ]]; [[מִשְׁלוֹחַ יָדָם]]; cf. [[משמעת]] MI:28).
